reviews.subject: Mathematics
reviews.review: Dr. Smith explains difficult concepts very clearly and is always willing to help during office hours.

reviews.subject: Physics
reviews.review: Excellent professor! Makes learning physics fun and engaging.

reviews.subject: Chemistry
reviews.review: Dr. Brown has a lot of knowledge, but his lectures can be a bit dry at times.

reviews.subject: Biology
reviews.review: Very knowledgeable and approachable. I learned a lot in her class.

reviews.subject: Computer Science
reviews.review: The course material was interesting, but Dr. Wilson's teaching style left much to be desired.

reviews.subject: English
reviews.review: Dr. Martin is passionate about literature and it shows in her teaching. Highly recommend!

reviews.subject: History
reviews.review: Dr. Lee has a deep understanding of historical events and makes the subject come alive.

reviews.subject: Psychology
reviews.review: The material is interesting, but Dr. Clark's lectures can be a bit unstructured.

reviews.subject: Economics
reviews.review: One of the best professors I've had! Makes complex concepts easy to understand.

reviews.subject: Sociology
reviews.review: Dr. Walker is very engaging and creates an inclusive classroom environment.

reviews.subject: Philosophy
reviews.review: His lectures are thought-provoking, but sometimes difficult to follow.

reviews.subject: Art History
reviews.review: Dr. Allen is very passionate about art and it reflects in her teaching.

reviews.subject: Engineering
reviews.review: The material is challenging, but Dr. King doesn't explain it very well.

reviews.subject: Business
reviews.review: Dr. Wright is an excellent professor who brings real-world experience into the classroom.

reviews.subject: Political Science
reviews.review: Dr. Scott is very knowledgeable and encourages critical thinking.

reviews.subject: Anthropology
reviews.review: Dr. Young has interesting insights, but her lectures can be a bit slow.

reviews.subject: Environmental Science
reviews.review: Very passionate about the subject and makes learning about the environment engaging.

reviews.subject: Music
reviews.review: Dr. Nelson is very talented and her passion for music is contagious.

reviews.subject: Geography
reviews.review: Dr. Carter's class is informative, but his lectures can be quite monotonous.

reviews.subject: Literature
reviews.review: Incredibly inspiring professor who makes literature come alive.
